info.name: WebApp Ticketing API
info.description: API collection untuk WebApp Ticketing Konser Platform - RBAC, Menu Management, Event Management, Ticket Category Management, Schedule Management (dengan rundown jadwal), Order Management, Check-in Management, User Management, Role Management, dan Permission Management. Sistem mendukung multiple events.

request.description: Health check endpoint
Ping endpoint
Get API v1 information and version
Login dengan email dan password. Guest role tidak bisa login ke admin dashboard.
Refresh access token menggunakan refresh token
Logout user (invalidate token on client side)

Get menus dan permissions untuk user yang sedang login berdasarkan JWT token. Response berisi array menus dan array permissions yang dapat diakses oleh role user tersebut. Endpoint ini menggunakan role_id dari JWT token yang sedang login.
Get semua events dengan pagination dan filters (admin only, requires event.read permission)
Get event by ID (admin only, requires event.read permission)

body.raw:
{
  "event_name": "Harry Potter Museum Exhibition",
  "description": "Experience the magic of Harry Potter with interactive exhibits, original props, and immersive experiences.",
  "banner_image": "https://example.com/banner.jpg",
  "start_date": "2025-06-01",
  "end_date": "2025-07-31"
}

request.description: Create event baru (admin only, requires event.create permission)

body.raw:
{
  "event_name": "Harry Potter Museum Exhibition - Updated",
  "description": "Updated description with new features and attractions.",
  "banner_image": "https://example.com/new-banner.jpg",
  "start_date": "2025-06-01",
  "end_date": "2025-08-31"
}

request.description: Update event (admin only, requires event.update permission)
Delete event (admin only, requires event.delete permission)

Update event status (admin only, requires event.update permission).

**Valid Status Values:**
- `draft` - Event masih dalam tahap draft, belum dipublikasikan. Default status saat event dibuat.
- `published` - Event sudah dipublikasikan dan dapat dilihat oleh guest/authenticated users di public endpoint (`/api/v1/events`).
- `closed` - Event sudah ditutup, tidak dapat menerima order baru.

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "status": "published"
}
```

**Notes:**
- Status harus salah satu dari: `draft`, `published`, atau `closed`
- Hanya event dengan status `published` yang akan muncul di public endpoint (`GET /api/v1/events`)
- Event dengan status `draft` hanya dapat dilihat oleh admin
Upload banner image untuk event (admin only, requires event.update permission). Gunakan form-data dengan key 'banner'.
Get published events saja untuk guest/authenticated users (public endpoint, requires authentication). Hanya menampilkan events dengan status 'published'.
Get published event by ID untuk guest/authenticated users (public endpoint, requires authentication). Hanya menampilkan event jika statusnya 'published'.

Get menus yang dapat diakses oleh role user yang sedang login berdasarkan JWT token. Admin akan mendapat semua menu, staff_ticket hanya mendapat Dashboard dan Ticket Management. Endpoint ini menggunakan role_id dari JWT token yang sedang login.
Get semua menus (admin only, requires menu.read permission)
Create menu baru (admin only, requires menu.create permission)
Update menu (admin only, requires menu.update permission)
Delete menu (admin only, requires menu.delete permission)
Get semua ticket categories (admin only, requires ticket_category.read permission)
Get ticket category by ID (admin only, requires ticket_category.read permission)

item.name: Get Ticket Categories by Event ID

request.description: Get ticket categories by event ID (admin only, requires ticket_category.read permission)
Create ticket category baru (admin only, requires ticket_category.create permission)
Update ticket category (admin only, requires ticket_category.update permission)
Delete ticket category (admin only, requires ticket_category.delete permission)
Get semua schedules (admin only, requires schedule.read permission)
Get schedule by ID (admin only, requires schedule.read permission)
Get schedules by event ID (admin only, requires schedule.read permission). Response includes artist_name dan rundown jadwal event.

body.raw:
{
  "event_id": "{{event_id}}",
  "date": "2025-06-01",
  "session_name": "Morning Session",
  "start_time": "2025-06-01T09:00:00Z",
  "end_time": "2025-06-01T12:00:00Z",
  "artist_name": "Harry Potter Orchestra",
  "rundown": "09:00 - Opening Ceremony\n09:30 - Main Performance by Harry Potter Orchestra\n11:00 - Interactive Session with Props\n11:30 - Q&A Session with Cast\n12:00 - Closing & Photo Session",
  "capacity": 200,
  "remaining_seat": 200
}

request.description: Create schedule baru dengan rundown jadwal event (admin only, requires schedule.create permission). Include artist_name dan rundown untuk detail jadwal acara.

body.raw:
{
  "session_name": "Morning Session Updated",
  "start_time": "2025-06-01T10:00:00Z",
  "end_time": "2025-06-01T13:00:00Z",
  "artist_name": "Harry Potter Orchestra & Special Guest",
  "rundown": "10:00 - Opening Ceremony\n10:30 - Main Performance by Orchestra\n11:30 - Special Guest Performance (Surprise Artist)\n12:00 - Interactive Session with Magic Props\n12:30 - Q&A Session with Cast & Crew\n13:00 - Closing & Autograph Session",
  "capacity": 250,
  "remaining_seat": 200
}

request.description: Update schedule termasuk rundown jadwal event (admin only, requires schedule.update permission). Dapat update artist_name dan rundown.
Delete schedule (admin only, requires schedule.delete permission)

query.description: Filter by payment status: UNPAID, PAID, FAILED, CANCELED, REFUNDED

request.description: Get semua orders dengan pagination dan filters (admin only, requires order.read permission)
Get order by ID (admin only, requires order.read permission)
Get order by order code (admin only, requires order.read permission)
Update order (admin only, requires order.update permission). Biasanya digunakan untuk update payment status setelah webhook dari Midtrans.
Delete order (admin only, requires order.delete permission)
Validate QR code sebelum check-in. Endpoint ini memeriksa apakah QR code valid, ticket sudah dibayar, dan belum pernah digunakan. Requires authentication (any authenticated user).
Perform check-in operation. Endpoint ini akan validasi QR code, cek duplicate, dan melakukan check-in. Requires authentication (any authenticated user).

query.description: Filter by status: SUCCESS, FAILED, DUPLICATE

request.description: Get semua check-ins dengan pagination dan filters (admin only, requires checkin.read permission)
Get check-in by ID (admin only, requires checkin.read permission)
Get check-ins by QR code (admin only, requires checkin.read permission)

request.description: Get check-ins by order item ID (admin only, requires checkin.read permission)
Get check-ins by gate ID (admin only, requires checkin.read permission)

query.description: Filter by VIP status: true, false
Search by name, code, or location

request.description: Get semua gates dengan pagination dan filters (admin only, requires gate.read permission)
Get gate by ID (admin only, requires gate.read permission)

body.raw:
{
  "code": "GATE-A",

request.description: Create a new gate (admin only, requires gate.create permission)
Update a gate (admin only, requires gate.update permission)
Delete a gate (admin only, requires gate.delete permission)
Assign a ticket to a specific gate (admin only, requires gate.update permission). Validates VIP priority entry system.
Perform check-in at a specific gate. Validates gate status, capacity, and VIP priority entry system. Requires authentication (any authenticated user).
Get gate statistics including total check-ins, today check-ins, VIP check-ins, and regular check-ins (admin only, requires gate.read permission)

query.description: Search by name, email, or QR code
Filter by ticket tier: VIP, General, Premium, Standard
Filter by status: registered, checked_in, cancelled

Get attendee statistics (admin only, requires attendee.read permission)

query.description: Search by name, email, or QR code
Filter by ticket tier: VIP, General, Premium, Standard
Filter by status: registered, checked_in, cancelled

request.description: Export attendees to CSV (admin only, requires attendee.export permission)

query.description: Filter by status: active, low_stock, sold_out, inactive

Get ticket by ID (admin only, requires ticket.read permission)

query.description: Number of recent orders to return (default: 10, max: 50)

request.description: Get recent orders for ticket management dashboard (admin only, requires order.read permission)

variable.description: Event ID untuk testing. Event ID dapat diambil dari seeder atau create event baru.
QR code untuk testing check-in. QR code dapat diambil dari order item setelah order dibuat dan ticket generated.
